title: We Are The World
lyrics:
[intro] (F)
(F)There comes a time (F)
When we (Bb-)heed a (-C)certain (F)call (F)
When the (Bb)world… must (C)come together as (F)one (F)
 
There are (Dm)people dying (Dm)
Oh, and it's (Am)time to lend a (Am)hand
To (Gm)life… the (Bb)greatest gift of (C)all (C)
 
(F)We can't go on (F)
Pre(Bb-)tending (-C)day by (F)day (F)
That (Bb)someone, some(C)where soon make a (F)change (F)
 
We're (Dm)all a part of (Dm)
God's (Am)great big family (Am)
And the (Gm) truth, you know, (Bb)love is all we (C)need (C)
 
We are the (Bb)world (C)
We are the (F)children (F)
We are the (Bb)ones who make a brighter (C)day
So let's start (F)giving (F)
There's a (Dm)choice we're making (Dm)
We're (Am)saving our own (Am)lives
It's (Gm)true we'll make a better (C)day, just you and (F)me (F)
 
Oh, (F)send them your heart (F)
So they (Bb-)know that (-C)someone (F)cares (F)
And their (Bb)lives will (C)be stronger and (F)free (F)
 
As (Dm)God has shown us (Dm)
By (Am)turning stones to (Am)bread
And so we (Gm)all must (Bb)lend a helping (C)hand (C)
 
We are the (Bb)world (C)
We are the (F)children (F)
We are the (Bb)ones who make a brighter (C)day
So let's start (F)giving (F)
There's a (Dm)choice we're making (Dm)
We're (Am)saving our own (Am)lives
It's (Gm)true we'll make a better (C)day, just you and (F)me (F)
 
When you're (Db)down and out, there (Eb)seems no hope at (F)all (F)
But if you (Db)just believe there's (Eb)no way we can (F)fall (F)
 
Well, well, well, well let us (Dm)realize (Dm)
Oh, that a (Am)change can only (Am)come
When (Bb)we… (Bb)stand together as (C)one, yeah, (C)yeah, yeah
 
We are the (Bb) world (C) (we are the world)
We are the (F)children (F) (we are the children)

So let's start (F)giving (F) (so let's start giving)

It's (Gm)true we'll make a better (C)day, just you and (F)me (F)
